pitapi.pit
Class project

lucee.Component
        pitapi.pit.project

public class project

extends lucee.Component

Handles all request to /rest/project.

Methods inherited from class lucee.Component
 

Method Detail

addProject

remote any addProject()
Creates a project with the given parameters in the FORM scope. POST /rest/project. Requires the user_id of the user creating the project and the project_title.

editProject

remote any editProject([string id])
Updates the project with the given id. Checks for uniqueness of the setup key and title

Parameters:
id

getProject

remote any getProject()
Returns the *project* with the given id in the FORM scope. POST /rest/project/456
